title.narrative: Support to Bangladesh for COVID-19 Preparedness and Response

description.narrative: The World Food Program (WFP) will utilise this emergency support from Australia to work with the Bangladesh Government to ensure food security for Bangladeshis currently in Covid-19 quarantine in either government or private facilities across the country. WFP will also assist Bangladesh Government procure protective and healthcare equipment for treatment, and equipment to assist build testing capabilities. The emergency support through this investment is aligned with the United Nations and Bangladesh Government's Country Preparedness and Response Plan (CPRP). The total estimated value of this investment is $2.0 million to be expensed during the 2019-20 financial year.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
